name: EAST PROVIDENCE SCHOOL COMMITTEE v. RHODE ISLAND BOARD OF REGENTS FOR EDUCATION
name_abbreviation: East Providence School Committee v. Rhode Island Board of Regents for Education

parties: EAST PROVIDENCE SCHOOL COMMITTEE v. RHODE ISLAND BOARD OF REGENTS FOR EDUCATION.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition for writ of certiorari is denied.
DORIS, J., did not participate.

attorneys: Nathaniel J. Rendine, Asst. City Sol., East Providence, for petitioner.
W. Slater Allen, Jr., Providence, for Susan Wood Marshall.
casebody.head_matter:
EAST PROVIDENCE SCHOOL COMMITTEE v. RHODE ISLAND BOARD OF REGENTS FOR EDUCATION.
No. 80-83-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
July 10, 1980.
Nathaniel J. Rendine, Asst. City Sol., East Providence, for petitioner.
W. Slater Allen, Jr., Providence, for Susan Wood Marshall.
